body.name: Mompush Wiz 2-in-1 Convertible Baby Stroller with Bassinet Mode - Foldable Infant Stroller to Explore More as a Family - Toddler Stroller with Reversible Stroller Seat
features: Room to Grow –– Use from birth (Compatible with most major Maxi-Cosi and Nuna car seats, car seat adapter SOLD SEPARATELY). Get an infant stroller that transforms to match the sprouting of their little limbs. This Mompush stroller provides a secure ride throughout early development. You can go from stroller to bassinet in minutes, with full recline for a comfy newborn ride

Open Up to the World –– Customize their positioning to suit their mood for that day with the reversible seat on these strollers for newborns. Go parent facing for extra reassurance, or outward-facing for visual stimulation, this modern baby stroller lets you decide

Smooth Strolling — The omnidirectional luxury stroller wheels allow for effortless 360-degree maneuvering. Paired with sturdy advanced suspension for exceptional cushioning. The newborn stroller even has a faux leather stroller handle for added grip and an easy glide

For On-the-Go Families — This bassinet stroller combo features a compact design with maximum storage capability. Stash everything you need under the seat, and get ready for all-day outings. When it’s time to go home, it folds up easily, for no stress loading and unloading

Shielded & Safe — When you're invited out on a bright sunny day, accept the invitation. This stroller for newborn children has a zip-out UPF 50+ canopy that provides maximum coverage. With ventilation panels on the side providing optimal airflow and natural light. Foot cover and rain cover included for severe weather

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The Mompush Wiz is a compact 2-in-1 baby stroller with a bassinet that transforms into a comfy seat that has everything you and your baby need to explore the city for years to come.
Suitable from birth to toddler. The Wiz is compatible with most major infant car seats giving you that next-level luxury for stylish travel. Car seat adapter sold seperately.

Take on All-terrains With tires designed to take on even the most rugged of terrains, this stroller is made to take on the great outdoors. Designed for Interaction Thanks to the “Peek-a-boo!” canopy, your child will have your reassuring voice and face while engaged with the world around them. Whatever the Weather Stroll all year long, in any weather, and rest assured that your baby’s super safe under the UPF 50+, weather-resistant canopy. Relax in Comfort All round suspension and never flat tires with swivel wheels for a smooth ride and one-hand steering.

Wiz Infant Car Seat Adapter for Maxi-Cosi and Nuna Car Seat Adapter (Mompush) for Wiz ONLY and Compatible with Maxi-Cosi AP, XP, Mico (30, Max 30, Max Plus) , Nuna (Pipa, Pipa Lite, Lite LX, Lite RX, and RX) and Cybex Aton, Cybex Aton Q, Cybex Aton 2Search ASIN: B09V44CBBZ Wiz Infant Car Seat Adapter for Chicco Car Seat Adapter (Mompush) for Wiz ONLY and Compatible with Chicco KeyFit 30, KeyFit 30 Zip, KeyFit 30 Zip Air, Fit2, Fit2 Air, Fit2 LESearch ASIN: B0B6ZXZGZK

What is included in the box with the Mompush Wiz? The Mompush Wiz comes in one package. It includes: stroller frame, 2 in 1 seat unit, footcover, rain cover, seat mattress, bumper bar, canopy, 4 wheels, shopping basket and a cup holder. What are the wheels made of? A high-grade, solid, EVA wheels. This material offers the cushioning of air-tires but without the punctures or maintenance. Which car seats are compatible with a Mompush Wiz? - Maxi-Cosi AP, XP, Mico (30, Max 30, Max Plus) - Nuna (Pipa, Pipa Lite, Lite LX, Lite RX, and RX) - Cybex Aton, Cybex Aton Q, Cybex Aton 2 - Chicco Key Fit 30 and Chicco Fit 2 *The car seat adapter is sold seperately How to fold the Mompush Wiz? The Wiz can be fold with or without seat attached. The Mompush Wiz should always be folded when the seat is road-facing. What materials are used in Mompush Strollers? Product materials are selected with safety, functionality, and durability in mind. Stroller frame is built with anodized aluminum to support a smooth ride. Seat and basket are made of polyester with organic cotton approved by OEKO-TEX stands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Top notch stroller
reviews.reviewText: The assembly was super easy. Today we took a 2.5 mile walk and this stroller was amazing to push!!!My granddaughter seemed very comfortable. Even my dog jumped into bottom basket and caught a ride. This stroller was sleek and smooth and worth every penny! In fact, way better than a nuna!!!We love this stiller and would recommend to everyone!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this stroller! Such a good quality.The only problem was that my 19 month old didn’t fit. He is too large.But if you have a newborn or a baby that is not over 15 months I recommend.The canopy is large, it comes with a rain cover, the bassinet is a plus, light weight…. And their customer service is a top notch

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this stroller!!!
reviews.reviewText: Just got this stroller and am already in love! I wanted a stroller that is easy to maneuver and also will grow with our baby. While I haven’t had this baby yet, I have used many strollers in the past for my twins so am comparing this to other strollers I have used. First, it was incredibly easy to put together, even by myself, large and pregnant. It pushes so smoothly with 360 degree front wheels. Has a very large basket underneath for storage. Very easy to convert from infant car seat to bassinet to toddler seat modes. I bought the separate infant car seat adapter and my Chicco car seat locks in perfectly. After removing the car seat, the frame folds down effortlessly. The bassinet is very sturdy and I didn’t realize it came with a removable cover (cover is on in the photos) which will be perfect for walks in the winter. It even came with a clear waterproof stroller cover for walks in the rain! The cup holder does fit a 40 oz Stanley but feels a little too heavy so will probably need to get a smaller Stanley or see if there is a more intense cup holder that can be added. Can’t wait to go for many strolls!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for the Price and comparable to high end strollers
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this stroller for our 2.5yo for our upcoming trip to Disney World. We wanted something compact to maneuver through crowds but large enough for her to sit comfortably.PROS:The stroller is beautiful and the color is a while vibe. Well made with quality materials. LOVE how large the canopy is, even with the seat reclined! Easy to maneuver in tight spaces (with the front wheels unlocked). Large storage basket. One hand fold. Flat fold, without seat attached.CONS:Not the best for tall/larger toddlers. Our girl's head is literally IN the canopy. If we didn't absolutely need a stroller for our trip, I'd return for this reason. If your LO is in the 70thpercentile+ keep looking! Folding with seat attached is bulky, not a deal breaker for us because it still fits in our SUV with room to spare. 2 hands required to open and a bit awkward, this will probably become easier over time. Not as comfortable for shorter people... my husband loves the handle bar height, he's 6'3. I wish the handle was adjustable because at 5'1 the bar is level with my chest. YES, I could've purchased the other model for $100 more but our intentions were to find a decent stroller under $200 for travel and this fit that bill!Overall, my LO doesn't seem to mind her lack of headspace and never wants to get out of the stroller so I'd say it's a winner! We'll see if she still loves it after our trip.Recommended accessories: clip on fan, stroller hooks, snack cup, silicone toy straps (for those toddlers that love to throw), stroller side sling, phone mount.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: As a mom, sometimes you have to weigh a million factors before making a choice, strollers, car seats, the list is endless and it’s really hard to jump and pick one over the millions of others you’ve looked at! Trust me when I say that for the price this is the most convertible and convenient stroller, you get the features of the bassinet up until 22.6 kilograms (49.8 pounds roughly) which is actually quite heavy, most kids will want to be running around by the time they outgrow it. Not to mention the parent facing feature is so helpful for doctor’s appointments where I would more prefer my child face me versus out towards strangers! It’s not as compact as others similarly designed but you pop the seat off and the base slides compact and then you can just stack one on the other in a trunk to transport it wherever. Just because it’s not suitcase size doesn’t actually hurt my review on it, it still collapses down small enough it’s not a huge waste of space. The wheels are also a deal breaker other strollers suck as soon as you hit weird surfaces but these have the 360 degree turn feature so unless you are in a couple inches of mud, sleet, or snow it should hold up great. And if you don’t want the 360 degree turn feature at the moment you just slide the ring around each foot base and it locks into place just as easily as it can pop into 360 mode if you’d like to. All around I love this stroller much more than anything else I’ve ever had, assembly was a little difficult (only popping the canopy into place the rest of it fit snug and I had no issue getting it together by myself!) and the color came out beautiful I picked the sage and I am NOT disappointed with the color. All around 10/10 for what I was looking for, and for less than 200$ it’s my number one pick for any moms on a budget who want something convertible and long-lasting from newborn to toddler stage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality and functional
reviews.reviewText: Great quality for the price and functional! I also ordered the adapter to use with a car seat. Easy to put together and take apart/fold up. I can’t wait to use this with my little one
